articles.content: Oppo F19 is an upcoming smartphone by Oppo. The phone is rumoured to come with a 6.43-inch touchscreen display with a resolution of 1080x2400 pixels and an aspect ratio of 20:9. Oppo F19 is expected … [+1424 chars]
